sentences.en: A versatile person is often good at a number of different things.
sentences.cn: 多才多艺的人通常擅长许多种不同的事情.
燃料电池是非常适用的.

sentences.en: He had been one of the game's most versatile athletes.
sentences.cn: 他是这项运动中技术最全面的运动员之一。

sentences.en: He is a versatile, veteran and superb technician.
sentences.cn: 他是个技术全面、经验丰富、技巧娴熟的运动能手

sentences.en: He is sparkling and versatile in front of the camera.
sentences.cn: 镜头前的他光彩照人，多才多艺。

sentences.en: He's a versatile actor who has played a wide variety of parts.
sentences.cn: 他是个多才多艺的演员，扮演过各种各样的角色。

sentences.en: It is possible to harness the versatile chemical properties of cyanogen azide.
sentences.cn: 氰化叠氮的灵活多变的化学性质是可控制的.

sentences.en: Modern communication technologies certainly offer the most versatile classrooms imaginable.
sentences.cn: 现代通讯技术当然能提供无所不包的理想课堂.

sentences.en: Never before has computing been so versatile.
sentences.cn: 计算机的用途从没像现在这么广泛过。

sentences.en: Pork is also the most versatile of meats. It can be roasted whole or in pieces.
sentences.cn: 在肉类中，猪肉的做法也是最多的，可以整块烤来吃，也可以切片烤来吃。

sentences.en: She is a versatile and superlative actress.
sentences.cn: 她是位多才多艺、演技高超的女演员.

sentences.en: The finite - element method is the most versatile.
sentences.cn: 有限元法是最有用的方法.

sentences.en: The potato is an extremely versatile vegetable.
sentences.cn: 马铃薯是一种用途极广的蔬菜。

sentences.en: This is an extremely versatile new kitchen machine.
sentences.cn: 这是一种功能极多的新型厨房机械.

sentences.en: This versatile vegetable can be eaten raw or cooked.
sentences.cn: 这种蔬菜有多种吃法，既可生吃也可烹调后食用。

sentences.en: Tomorrow this versatile substance may be called in to help feed man.
sentences.cn: 明天这种用途广泛的物质可能会被用来为人们提供食物.

words.tran_cn: 多功能性；多才多艺；用途广泛

trans.tran_cn: （指工具、机器等）多用途的，多才多艺的，有多种学问、技能或职业的，多功能的
